array.name: cat_voice
array.item: I want to go to sleep
I want to take a bath
I want to go for a walk
I want to bite my toys
I want to run on a grass
You want to be my hooman?

array.name: dog_voice
array.item: I want to go to sleep
I want to take a bath
I want to go for a walk
I want to bite my toys
I want to run on a grass
You want to be my hooman?

array.name: show_cat_words
array.item: Hey bro! I feel great today! Give me a loving touch! Come on!
I am angry! Why don’t you feed your sweetheart?! Why don’t you clean my poop?!
Stop! I am afraid of you! I hate you! Take care of my punch!
Well? Hey guy! What are you eating?
Enmmm~ Good job bro~ I am very satisfied with you!
You know what? I need a girlfriend, seriously.
You must be a good master! Certified!
I am really waiting for you to go back home~
Is there any food for me?
Hey bro~ There is nothing but serving your sweetheart for a lifetime! Hiahiahia~
What’s wrong with you, my baby?
T H A T ‘s A L L M I N E! A L L!
Hey it’s you! Why don’t you serve me now?
Your lord can not understand you.
Stop! Otherwise, don’t blame me for hitting you!
You can speak in Meow Meow Meow?!
Your pronunciation can’t be worse, give it up! Ok?
Not bad~ But I want more~
Honey~ Let me give you a hug~
Come play the game with me!
It smells that there is something to eat! For me!

array.name: show_dog_words
array.item: Aha! Stand there! And don’t move!
What I want to do is staying with you.
I am so hungry! I want a small sausage.
My dear boss~ Look at my skinny body~
You know that! Don’t bully me too much!
I did something wrong… Mom must be mad…
Look! I protected you! What a good job I have done!
Being human is so complicated. They always do something that I can’t understand.
Stop bad boy! Today is not your day!
I am very annoyed, come and say something funny for me! Right now!
I hate you! You are bad! Get off!
Nobody here but I feel a stomachache, where are you Mom?
I have something to talk about with you, Daddy and Mom.
Yohoo~ I don’t want to get in trouble.
I have been here! Here is my possession!
You are the boss at home, and I listen to you.
Is anybody here? I am so lonely that I need a partner!
I am hungry. Serve me to eat!
I am so happy! Let’s rock and roll!
I am so angry! And I am going to bite you!
It is not my idea. Please accept my apology!
Come on~ Give my lovely belly a loving touch~
I will be a good kid.
